comments.body:
With this line, tsc 2.5 raises an error:
> tsconfig.json(10,9): error TS5023: Unknown compiler option 'strictFunctionTypes'.

Without this line, `npm run lint react-hyperscript` raises an error:
> Error: Expected `"strictFunctionTypes": true` or `"strictFunctionTypes": false`.

After some googling, I found [a comment that says that DefinitelyTyped's test runner will ignore the former](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/issues/19294#issuecomment-337646626)
So, I decided to keep this line.
Yeah, it's fine, we'll ignore the error for older TS versions.
